query:
SELECT aty.id, aty.auditName, aty.templateReference, aty.category,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM auditTemplates WHERE auditTypeId = aty.id) as templateCount
FROM auditTypes aty
HAVING templateCount = 0
ORDER BY aty.category, aty.auditName;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user aVmfAzGaFwUYThZ.5c3d77929c0b --database mF7Zux5nFuxUoJfuPYEPAJ --execute SELECT aty.id, aty.auditName, aty.templateReference, aty.category,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM auditTemplates WHERE auditTypeId = aty.id) as templateCount

HAVING templateCount = 0
ORDER BY aty.category, aty.auditName;
